snippet: Michelle Bachelet, who was president of Chile from 2006 to 2010, won a lopsided victory in a national primary on Sunday.
abstract: Michelle Bachelet, president of Chile from 2006 to 2010, wins lopsided victory in national primary, making her the favorite to win back the presidency in November.
lead_paragraph: Michelle Bachelet, who was president of Chile from 2006 to 2010, won a lopsided victory in a national primary on Sunday.

headline.main: Ex-Leader of Chile Wins Primary in Bid to Return
headline.print_headline: Ex-Leader of Chile Wins Primary in Bid to Return
